name: FamilyFriendlyCooking
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: family friendly
Developer Terms of Use
des: According to a survey, people generally spend only around 37 minutes daily with family members that can be described as “quality time. Why not extend that time with cooking when with Family Friendly Cooking. You can learn new recipes that are fun and easy to cook with us. Find new tastes to share with your family or learn how to make them taste even better with a little variation.
